text: Ara raja balalena -- ''take amara kache niye esa.’’ Sutaram yakhana duta tamra kache ela, tini balalena -- ''tomara manibera kache phire ya'o ebam tamke jijnesa kara se'i naridera ki hala yara tadera hata ketechila. Nihsandeha amaba prabhu, tadera phandiphikira sanbandhe purna oyakiphahala.’’
